name: Melee
description: A Melee represents an Entity which can be Pickable by a Character and can be used to melee attack, Charactes can hold it with hands with pre-defined handling modes.

functions.name: AddAnimationCharacterUse
functions.description_long:
Sets an Animation when attacking

You can add more than one animation, which will be selected randomly when attacking

parameters.name: slot_Type
parameters.description: Whether to play it on upper body or full body

functions.name: ClearAnimationsCharacterUse
functions.description: Clears the Character Attack Animation list

functions.name: SetImpactSound
functions.description: Sets the Sound when hitting something
functions.description_long:
Sets the Sound when hitting something

Note: Surfaces Water and Flesh already have default sounds and must be explicitly set to override

parameters.name: surface_type
parameters.description: The surface to apply the sound. Use SurfaceType.Default to be the default to all hits

functions.name: SetDamageSettings
functions.description: Sets the times when to start applying damage and when to end
functions.description_long: Sets the times when to start applying damage and when to end. During this time the collision of the melee will be enabled and the damage will be applied if it hits something

parameters.name: damage_start_time
parameters.description: The initial time to start applying damage

parameters.name: damage_duration_time
parameters.description: The duration time to stop applying damage

functions.name: GetAnimationsCharacterUse
functions.description: Gets the Animations when Character uses it

functions.name: GetSoundUse
functions.description: Gets the Sound when Character uses it

events.name: Attack
events.description: Triggered when the Character effectively attacks with this Melee
